links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,100
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,20,print(floor(gamma(n/4)*(gamma(n+1)/4))))(PARI) { default(realprecision, 300); for (n=1, 100, write("b062512.txt", n, " ", (gamma(n/4)*(gamma(n + 1))\4)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 08 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 24 2001
extensions: Terms corrected by _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 08 2009
